title: Mashkar, Khuzestan
text: Mashkar (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Māshkār) is a village in <a href="Shahi%20Rural%20District">Shahi Rural District</a>, <a href="Sardasht%20District">Sardasht District</a>, <a href="Dezful%20County">Dezful County</a>, <a href="Khuzestan%20Province">Khuzestan Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 94, in 15 families.
